product.title: Spectrum Rock Blue - Venetian Blind
product.description: Rock blue is a soft aqua offering from the spectrum range and, reminiscent of the ocean, this blind is a show-stealer. Don't mistake it for all style and no substance though, because the aluminium slats are high quality and fully adjustable, making this a practical window covering as well as an attractive one. Give the rock blue a serene white backdrop in the bathroom, to offset it beautifully, or surround with sand colours in the dining room to truly recreate the beach.

relproducts.title: Rimini Azure - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The pale blue of the rimini in azure will make you see bright white clouds the more you look at it. It really is the colour of that blue sky we hope to wake up to every day, and with this in your room, you might just be able to fool yourself. Nestle amongst white walls and pale woods to really emulate that outdoors feel, or pair with sunny yellows to create a pretty, cheerful atmosphere. Perfect for waking up to in a bedroom or a subtly coloured nursery; or for a cool, clean look in a contemporary dining room.

relproducts.title: Rimini Turquoise - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The bright aqua of the rimini in turquoise gives a cheery and contemporary look to a window. The smooth fabric is hardy enough to keep out the brighter sun rays, yet lightweight enough to allow a little light to still penetrate through. Pair with greens and browns for a fun, jungle theme, or with stark whites and pale, ice blues for a striking look and a cool, fresh atmosphere. This is perfect for a current, clean look in a bedroom or as part of an aquatic look in a bathroom.

relproducts.title: Rimini Powder Blue - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Rimini's powder blue is a cool, icy hue that brings a clean, fresh vibe to any room it's used in. Offering privacy whilst still allowing plenty of light through, you'll have no concerns about shadows or darkness in your room when it's closed. Complement navy blues, aqua shades, and deep sapphires to create a neat, coordinated look in a bedroom or living room. It will also work beautifully with bright whites for a subtle, crisp style that's perfect for a modern kitchen or bathroom.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Sapphire Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholm sapphire blue is a beautiful colour, and works erfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder & great for injecting colour into any room. Their stockholm sapphire blue roller blind is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. As with all their made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee which covers all parts of the blind.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Dark Teal Blue Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholm dark teal blue is a beautiful colour, and works perfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder & great for injecting colour into any room. Their splash dark teal blue roller blind is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords maing them inherently child safe.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Midnight Blue Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Their best-selling stockholm range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish, the fabric offers wonderful light filtering properties & in addition to this is also moisture resistant. This range of fabrics are the perfect choice for kitchens, bathrooms & en-suites. This rich midnight blue roller blind will brighten any room and offers wonderful light filtering properties meaning you can can achieve complete privacy without completely blocking light from coming into the room.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Brittany Blue Roller Blind
relproducts.description: This light brittany blue roller blind will brighten any room and offers wonderful light filtering, and moisture resistant properties meaning you can can achieve complete privacy without completely blocking light from coming into the room. This light blue fabric will look stunning paired with natural wooden tones or will offer a perfect splash of colour when hung in a cool, compemporary grey scheme.

relproducts.title: Valencia Cobalt Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The versatility of the blue fabric is stunning. The dark blue tones can be paired with steel & wooden finishes for a modern twist or as a perfect complement to whites and further shades of blue in more traditional interiors.

relproducts.title: Oslo Blackout Brittany Blue Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Their best-selling oslo blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. This cool-toned brittany blue blue roller blind refreshes any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.

relproducts.title: Oslo Blackout Dark Teal Blue Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Their best-selling oslo blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. This dramatic dark teal blue roller blind refreshes any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.

relproducts.title: Spectrum Space Blue - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The spectrum range's space blue is a classic, bold blue, on a delightfully smooth, satin-finish aluminium. Fully adjustable slats sit neatly, and can be easily manoeuvred to control the amount of light that is let into the room. Enhance a cool blue child's room by placing the space blue against pale blue walls or patterned wallpaper, pairing with white furniture, and accenting with playful primary colours.

relproducts.title: Spectrum Lima - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Let the natural apple green of the spectrum lima light up your home. The lightweight feel, yet sturdy quality, aluminium slats sit neatly and adjust easily, adding workability and function to style and aesthetics in this pretty blind. The muted green of the lima will match browns and creams in equal measure, and can even sit pretty amongst darker forest greens. Use for a lovely, colourful style in the living room, as a standout window feature in the dining room, or as part of a tranquil, calming scheme in the home office.

relproducts.title: Spectrum Casablanca - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The spectrum casablanca comes with just a hint of fruity orange, making it stand out from other shades of yellow. A shiny, gloss finished blind, it comprises of heavy gauge aluminium slats, alongside coordinating cords and rails. The colour-blocking trend doesn't seem to be going away, so take advantage and use the casablanca against bright sky blues, emerald greens, or stark whites in a den, playroom, or dining room.

relproducts.title: Spectrum Picton Blue - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: If you love blue in all its shades, but are looking for that perfect sky blue, look no further, because we've found it. The spectrum in picton blue is sweet blue that feels as if it's been grabbed directly from the sky, and matching rails and pull-cords streamline the look. The pretty, outdoorsy feel of the picton blue makes this the perfect choice for a light and airy kitchen, where you can recreate a sky-like feel by adding in whites and paler blues.

relproducts.title: Spectrum Solitaire - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The spectrum in solitaire brings a barely-there cream with hints of pink or peach, proving that plain doesn't necessarily mean plain. The satin-finish aluminium is strong and durable, and most importantly, guaranteed not to sag. This wipe-clean blind is perfect for a bathroom or kitchen, and the subtle shade will be beautifully complemented by richer peaches or darker pinks, with silver accents providing the finishing touches.

relproducts.title: Spectrum Magic Mint - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The spectrum in magic mint offers contemporary style and a beautiful spearmint hue that will suit clean, airy rooms. The satin-finish aluminium is durable and lasting, with matching pull-cords and rails resulting in pure, uninterrupted colour. Offset mocha browns and soft taupes by placing the magic mint in the home office amidst light woods and white soft furnishings for a serene, relaxing feel.

relproducts.title: Spectrum Christine - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Add a hint of citrus to a dim window with the spectrum in christine. This fun, vibrant blind has a satin finish and neatly sitting aluminium slats that can be tilted or moved using matching cords according to how much light you would like in the room. Make the christine pop by hanging in a white kitchen or utility room, with colour-coordinated orange and contrasting lime accessories to bring out the gorgeous orange hue.

relproducts.title: Spectrum Pickled Bluewood - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The darkest of blues is blended with a muted, understated elegance, resulting in the pickled bluewood from the spectrum collection. This smooth, satin-finish aluminium blind has horizontal slats that are easily manoeuvrable using the colour-coordinated pull-cords. Keep light disturbances out in the den or home office with the cool pickled bluewood hanging pleasantly in the window, coupled with light greys and chevron patterning.

relproducts.title: Spectrum Gossip - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The spectrum's gossip is a funky lime green with a gloss finish that adds shine and class to the heavy gauge aluminium. The lime shade offers fun and vivacity, making this a bold and colourful choice. The gossip's bright hue will complement stark whites and other citrus shades, the perfect colour scheme for a teenager's bedroom or the home office. Alternatively, use as a complement to a monochromatic dcor scheme, to add a pop of colour in a black and white dining room or bathroom.

relproducts.title: Spectrum Mill Brook - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Creamy and luxurious, yet not overpowering, spectrum's millbrook is a delicious shade of brown. Its discreet satin finish only serves to promote this look, and this blind will look simply gorgeous with the slats adjusted either up or down. Give your home office an opulent feel that is also relaxing and unobtrusive, by placing against cream or pale taupe walls, and accessorising with the occasional splashes of soft aqua and pale gold.

relproducts.title: Spectrum Science Blue - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The science blue blind, from the spectrum range, is vividness at its finest. The bright blue aluminium slats exude modern, contemporary style, whilst offering easy workability with the simple pull-cords to tilt and control the blind, to allow light in or to keep it out. For a cool, industrial vibe in your office, sit the science blue amongst the palest of greys, with white furniture, accompanied by charcoal grey and pale blue accents, resulting in a funky, colour-coordinated look that you won't want to leave.

relproducts.title: Spectrum Blue Chill - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Combine a deep, vivid turquoise with high quality aluminium slats, and you're left with the spectrum blue chill, a stunningly vibrant blind with plenty to offer in terms of style, colour, and workability. Sit the gorgeous blue chill amongst soft sands and barely-there aquas to create a seaside vibe that is simply irresistible, an ideal colour scheme for the bathroom or en-suite. Or use in a child's bedroom with the softest of pinks, which will serve to make this blind truly pop.

relproducts.title: Turin 25mm Ocean Blue Aluminium Venetian
relproducts.description: Introduce calming ocean blue shades into your space with their aluminium venetian blinds. An all-rounder that will work perfectly with cool greys or as a pop of colour with neutrals and wooden tones. Their 25mm venetian blinds offer a slim profile ensuring a sleek finish for your home or office. relproducts.title: Turin 25mm Tropic Blue Aluminium Venetian
relproducts.description: Their decorative 25mm tropic blue is a stunning mid blue colour, tropic blue is a smooth matt effect slat. Use this blind to instil a flash of colour within grey interior styling or be really bold and clash with bright oranges to create a funky brightly coloured space. Their 25mm venetian blinds offer a slim profile making them perfect for the even the narrowest window recesses. We love them within the home or office.

relproducts.description: Their extensive range of gloss and matt finishes in a full spectrum of colour means we are sure you will find something for you. This pastel blue venetian blind is perfect to create a cool hue in any room in your home. relproducts.title: Spirit Navy Venetian Blind - 25mm Slat
relproducts.description: Dark as the night but with a sleek, glossy finish, the spirit navy aluminium venetian blind is classy and perfect for the contemporary home. The aluminium slats are incredibly hard wearing, so this blind is perfect for the kitchen or bathroom where you can incorporate it into dark as the night but with a sleek, glossy finish, the spirit navy aluminium venetian blind is classy and perfect for the contemporary home.
